name: com.unity.services.wire
description: Wire provides notifications in real-time for Unity Gaming Services subscribing to a particular service and listening for messages from that subscription through a websocket connection.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed

- Added `ResetStaticsOnLoad` with annotation `RuntimeInitializeOnLoadMethod` to `HttpUtility` so static variables are reset upon entering playmode
- Added `ResetStaticsOnLoad` with annotation `RuntimeInitializeOnLoadMethod` to `CommandID` so static variables are reset upon entering playmode
